name: Starzplay
description:
Gift a loved one or close friend the access to stream thousands of blockbuster Hollywood Movies, TV Shows, Documentaries, Kids Entertainment and same-day-as-the-US series, along with dedicated Arabic and Bollywood content – all made possible with the STARZPLAY eGift Card !

STARZPLAY utilizes advanced technology to provide a premium viewing experience with full HD and 4K content sourced from some of the most important studios in the entertainment business, such as 20th Century Fox, CBS, Disney, Lionsgate, Paramount, Showtime, Sony, Starz, Universal and Warner Bros.

STARZPLAY also delivers amazing value – for a low monthly fee subscribers can enjoy unlimited ad-free access to a wide choice of entertainment. Developed exclusively for the MENA region, STARZPLAY features one-click Arabic subtitling plus Arabic and French audio options. STARZPLAY allows you to watch anytime, anywhere on an iOS or Android device, and also supports Mac and Windows browsers, and streams via Apple TV, Chromecast, a PS4 console or directly to a Samsung or LG smart TV. The service is available on regional IPTV services as well, while continually adding support for numerous other gaming and smart devices. STARZPLAY also allows downloads for offline playback

name: Free Fire Diamonds
description:
Free Fire Diamonds are the in-game currency of Free Fire, with players requiring these Diamonds to purchase items likes weapon skins, emotes and characters.

Free Fire is the ultimate survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Drive vehicles to explore the vast map, hide in trenches, or become invisible by proning under grass. Ambush, snipe, survive, there is only one goal: to survive and answer the call of duty.

name: Centrepoint
description:
Do you have a birthday or an anniversary celebration coming up? If the answer is yes, we are happy to tell you that you have clicked on the perfect gift card for each of these occasions. With an eGift card from Centrepoint, the receiver is given access to a large collection of fashionable apparel for all age groups and to an amazing assortment of shoes, cosmetics and household items.

Centrepoint is home to Splash, which is synonymous with fashion and style. So, if you are desperately looking for a gift for a fashionista or a follower of only the latest fashion trends, a Centrepoint gift card is perfect. Yes! They have items for everyone and for every occasion. Men, women and teenagers will rejoice with this gift card as they will able to buy the most stylish apparel. Mothers will also love this gift card as they can purchase the best baby clothes and items from Babyshop, that will make their baby comfortable and stylish, at the same time.

Let’s not forget the amazing range of shoes available at Centrepoint from the famous ShoeMart. The ShoeMart department is not to miss as gift receivers will be able to purchase items from the world’s most famous shoe brands, such as Sketchers, Puma, and Reebok.

Centrepoint gifts also give your loved ones access to Lifestyle. This brand is perfect for anyone looking to lay their hands on the best skincare products, makeup and perfumes. Not only that! Lifestyle is also your loved one’s gateway to the trendiest accessories, the best household furniture as well as the coolest room accessories for kids. So, if you need a gift for someone who just gave birth, someone who is all about healthy skin and beautiful make up, or even someone who loves handbags and wallets, Centrepoint is your go-to gift card !

It is amazing what one single gift card can do! In the case of Centrepoint, it can bring smiles, happiness, relief, comfort and style all at once. So go ahead, and choose Centrepoint today !

name: Alrimaya
description: Since 1976, Alrimaya stores series have offered integrated solutions for outdoor activities by providing a wide variety of products from the world-famous brands for hunting and camping needs requirements through more than 55 stores all over the kingdom of Saudi Arabia.  Few, if any, businesses today survive the kitchen-table dreams of their founders, especially in the outdoor industry where businesses come and go with the changing seasons. Yet, the leader in the outdoor equipment business has done just that- survived, grown, and prospered from simple beginnings in 1976 to become the largest retailer of hunting and camping and outdoor activities equipment in the Kingdom. With retail stores all around the kingdom, we have been able to provide the best-branded products from all around the world with emphasis on quality and design. And despite the accolades and growth, Alrimaya continues to embrace the original philosophy that the customer is No. 1 - a philosophy instilled by company founders.

With its highly aspirational, iconic logo the brand was immediately successful in the USA and rapidly emerged as a global brand. Beverly Hills Polo Club is positioned as a premium brand. The mission of the brand is to offer ‘affordable luxury’ to the rising upper middle class global consumer. The target customer is an upwardly mobile, young urban professional who is inspired by global fashion and trends.

name: Danube
description: Bring smiles to every occasion with a personalized Danube eGift card, designed to capture the essence of your special moments, whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or any other celebration!

name: Splash
description:
Looking to gift your fashionable ones the trendiest apparel and accessories? You can’t go wrong with a Splash eGift Card endorsed by none other than Bollywood superstar, Salman Khan! 

Splash offers trendy fashion & accessories for men, women and teens. It’s the perfect eGift Card for your stylish loved ones!

Headquartered in Dubai, Splash is Middle East’s largest fashion retailer and part of the Landmark Group, one of the biggest retail conglomerates in the Middle East, India and Africa. With an eye for the latest global trends and reflecting an everyday attitude, Splash binds together a collection that creates a definite style statement. The Splash Calendar and Splash Fashion Shows are by far the most popular annual and bi-annual events in the brand’s portfolio of events.

Showcasing popular collections for men, women and teens, Splash offers its customers a unique shopping environment by categorizing its collections like Splash Youth, Splash Woman, Splash Accessories, Splash Smart, and Splash DNM alongside featuring international brands like Lee Cooper, Bossini, ELLE and Being Human among others.

Splash Fashions has a range of clothing which are suitable for work, home, or just a regular day out. For men, there are the latest collection of shirts, and t-shirts that are good for everyday living as well as colorful trousers, shorts, and jeans in addition to several dressy and casual shoes. For women, there are a range of Formal Shirts, jumpers, blazers, cardigans, as well as dresses and skirts. Nothing spells chic and smart casual like Splash Fashions. The Splash Fashion kids store offers stylish clothing for juniors and would make it an ideal gift for a baby shower or for your trendy friends who like to dress their kids in the hottest fashions! Your loved one can also choose from a range of accessories such as scarves, gloves, hats, belts, cuff links, watches, bags, and sunglasses.

Whether you are looking to gift him, her or kids, Splash eGift Card is great for any occasion and your pocket, whether for a birthday, graduation or just to say “thanks”!

description: Anoosh is a top chocolatière in Jeddah who offer a large variety of assorted chocolates. However, the fame of this shop comes from the addictive chocolate chip cookies that are baked right before your eyes…it takes about 10 minutes..and it’s best to eat them a few minutes after they are fresh out of the oven when they almost melt in your hands they’re so fresh! They have a range of cookies, including the double chocolate chip where the cookie itself is chocolate and still has the chocolate chips inside. I personally prefer the normal chocolate chip cookies.

name: Babyshop
description:
When a baby is born, don’t you just want to spoil them silly? You can do that with a Babyshop eGift Card! 

Parents would be excited to receive this eGift, because they will have so many products to choose from such as clothes, toys, strollers, baby basics, travel accessories and so much more! At Babyshop, all of their baby, infant, and children’s needs will be met.

This eGift Card can help towards a snug sleeping bag or a super-hero baby-grow. Alternatively, cots, pushchairs, and nursery equipment are also up for grabs. Toys range from the cuddly and colourful to more high-tech and engaging gadgets, while bottles, first beds, and swanky outfits are available for those moving on from the toddle.

This store has everything that parents could possibly need for their children, from baby items to clothes for young adults. So don’t hesitate! Purchase a Babyshop eGift Card today.

name: Shukran
description:
A token of love, an expression of gratitude, a mark of celebration; what is the perfect gift for the perfect occasion?

Think outside the gift box!

Here’s presenting the Shukran Gift Card, a single gifting solution across the top Landmark Group brands. Enjoy the liberty to redeem at leading Landmark retail outlets, online and in-store. Use the card across KSA, just like how you would a debit card. Swipe at your favourite Landmark outlet and your purchases will be deducted from the total amount that is loaded on the card. Happy gifting!

name: Haddad
description:
This eGift card from Haddad is what would make any tech or gadget lovers day more interesting and exciting!
 
Haddad is a well reputed brand, with a strong presence in all major regions in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Featuring the latest in mobile phones, Tablets, gaming devices, Laptops, and other smart devices and accessories, Haddad believes in bringing the best in technology from all the leading tech brands in the world under one roof.

Haddad combines the best prices for the latest technology, with a focus on also delivering exceptional customer service, with their wide network of specialized service centres, and the attention to detail that is ensured through rigorous procedures followed in their daily operations,  thereby adding value and making any after sales services convenient for their customers. name: Saco
description:
With more than 45,000 items from over 1,000 brands, SACO operates currently 33 stores and exists in 18 cities across kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and still expanding.

SACO do not sell only goods, but tries to bring the best innovative solutions that help us live a better life by changing the standards of everyone’s lifestyle.

The variety SACO has is unique, and the position SACO tries to accommodate is providing methods that help the customers find a solution for any problem they might face.

At SACO showrooms, customers might expect to see an item as big as the largest possible swimming pool to the smallest like a mobile charger.

A single visit to SACO will clarify the business we have been doing since 1985 which place us in the lead of the retail market in Saudi Arabia.

name: Hema
description: HEMA is originally a Dutch chain that is characterized by relatively low pricing of generic housewares, with original design. The basic idea behind every HEMA product is to make daily life easier and more fun. The products are special and functional; and come at a great price of course! That is the unique and recognisable HEMA signature.

name: Almanea
description: Hamad Al-Manea Trade Co. is one of the biggest Saudi companies in home appliances, electronics & air conditioners trading and distribution which established at Riyadh in 1984 with a small shop selling new electrical home appliances in Haraj Bin Qasim. Then after sales growth because of good dealing with customers and distributers and with God reconcile we got more than 30 showrooms ar Riyadh, Jeddah, Kharj & Jazan, as we still working for more all over the saudi market.

name: Almosafer
description:
Treat your loved ones to a holiday they’ll never forget! Send an Almosafer eGift Card to your friends and family to spend on hotels & flights worldwide.

With access to more than 1.5 million hotels and over 450 airlines on its app and website, Almosafer caters to any type of travel need!

Great deals, simple user interface, quick booking process, convenient payment options, 24/7 customer support and transparency in prices & taxes make finding and booking the perfect flight and place to stay swift and easy!

Explore and sort hotels by location, price range, star rating & amenities or use special filters to find luxury or budget stays, family-friendly options, properties in top locations and more. Compare flight options with a wide range of airlines such as Saudia, flynas, Emirates, Kuwait Airways, Lufthansa and British Airways, and filter by price range, number of stops and other factors.

Pay instantly & securely with credit cards, debit cards, mada (for KSA), Knet (for Kuwait) or in installments (for cards with select banks). 

All this and more will make sure your loved ones get the perfect getaway they deserve! So go ahead and give the gift of travel!

name: Ardene
description:
Ardene, also known as Ardène in some locations, is a Canadian clothing and accessories retailer based in Montreal, Quebec. Since 1982, Ardene has been a one-stop shop for fashion-savvy and value-conscious consumers in North America.
 
Starting out as an accessory and jewellery store, Ardene is now one of the top shopping destinations in North America with over 400 stores and a fast-growing online presence. With a product assortment including clothing, footwear, accessories, jewellery, active wear, intimates, beauty products and more, Ardene makes fashion frugal for the youth.

name: Calvin Klein
description:
Calvin Klein, Inc. is one of the leading fashion design and marketing studios in the world. It designs and markets women’s and men’s designer collection apparel and a range of other products that are manufactured and marketed through an extensive network of licensing agreements and other arrangements worldwide.

Brands/lifestyles include Calvin Klein Collection, Calvin Klein Platinum Label, Calvin Klein Jeans and Calvin Klein Underwear. Product lines under the various Calvin Klein brands include women’s dresses and suits, men’s dress furnishings and tailored clothing, men’s and women’s sportswear and bridge and collection apparel, golf apparel, Jeanswear, underwear, fragrances, eyewear, women’s performance apparel, hosiery, socks, footwear, swimwear, jewelry, watches, outerwear, handbags and small leather goods.

name: Diplomat Patisserie
description: Diplomat Patisserie offer quality sweets, bakery goods, and a wide range of confectionery items like Arabic sweets, Cakes, French sweets, Bakery goods, Konafa, Chocolates, and of course their mouth watering strawberry cake!

name: Eyewa
description: eyewa is one of the leading optical companies in the Middle East, and offers an exclusive selection of eyeglasses, sunglasses, colored & clear contact lenses.

name: Fortnite (US Account)
description: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017. It is available in three distinct game mode versions that otherwise share the same general gameplay and game engine: Fortnite: Save the World, a cooperative shooter-survival game for up to four players to fight off zombie-like creatures and defend objects with fortifications they can build; Fortnite Battle Royale, a free-to-play battle royale game where up to 100 players fight to be the last person standing; and Fortnite Creative, where players are given complete freedom to create worlds and battle arenas.

name: Guess
description: Known worldwide for its innovative denim designs, GUESS is the ultimate, go-to lifestyle brand offering everything from wardrobe staples and seasonal favourites to fragrances, eyewear, accessories and timepieces.

name: Home Box
description:
Congratulating a loved one on their new home? Welcoming a new neighbour to the building or the compound? Thanking a colleague for their endless support? Helping new parents furnish their newborn’s room? Whatever it is that you were looking for, can be found right here. The Home Box eGift card suits all these needs and more!

This store is the ultimate destination for affordable, fashionable, urban and modern furniture and homeware. Home box gifts will let your loved one choose from around 6000 products! This is a lot of choice with just one eGift card. These products include living room items such as sofas, recliners, coffee tables, storage units and TV furniture, dining items like cutlery sets, and serving trays, as well as bedroom décor such as beds, night stands, wardrobes and mattresses.

Let’s not forget the unending list of furniture available for kids and youngsters! Home Box is where parents will find the most unique shapes and colors for their child’s rooms: race car beds, playhouse beds and princess beds are all available and will make them never want to leave their bedrooms.
 
Office furniture at Home Box is truly one of a kind, so if you need to thank your colleagues for their help, or reward your employees for a job well done, do it with Home Box eGift cards!

Furniture is not all that is in store at Home Box. This mega store also sells the accessories that go perfectly with the furniture of your loved one’s home. These include bed linens, comfortable pillows, stylish curtains, towels, candles, photo frames, clocks, wall art, rugs, lighting, and many more. Just name it and you can be sure that it is available at Home Box. 

So, if you know someone whose home need an upgrade, then don’t think further than this online eGift Card. All in all, the Home Box eGift card is the one that sends all the right messages. Every “Congratulations”, “Thank You”, “Happy Anniversary”, “Happy Mother’s Day”, “Happy Birthday”, “Happy House Warming”, “Merry Christmas”, and “Happy New Year” should be accompanied with this unique and one-of-a-kind, eGift card!

name: LuLu Hypermarket
description: Whether you are searching for a gift for a tech lover, a fashionista or simply even a seeker of top quality and the best prices, then LuLu Hypermarket must be your first selection. LuLu Hypermarket is truly a unique shopping experience for adults and children. With their broad selection of items, LuLu definitely has a treat for everyone! Your loved one will find exactly what he or she is looking for at LuLu Hypermarket. For the tech lovers, LuLu’s electronics department offers products like computers, televisions, smartphones, hard disks, tablets and printers, from top-quality brands such as Sony, Samsung, Lenovo, Toshiba, Kenwood and many more. There is no better gift for the technology experts. For all the fashionistas, LuLu Hypermarket also offers a huge variety of lifestyle and fashion goods, including perfumes, music instruments, watches, and unique apparel for men, women and kids. For those who are looking for the best quality food at the best possible prices, LuLu’s groceries department will not fail them. Their groceries assortment assures the customers that they are buying the best quality food items for themselves and for their families. From bread to meat and many more, LuLu has your loved ones’ grocery list covered. Better yet, LuLu’s household department offers unique home decors and household items that will definitely make a home stand out from the rest. Fridges, stoves, sandwich makers, coffee machines and cookware sets; LuLu has it all and at the best prices and the best quality. LuLu is a one-stop shop for all of their customers’ needs. They have won awards for being Retailer of the Year in 2009, have been named a Super Brand in 2010 and have even received the Dubai Quality Award that same year. Needless to say, LuLu is the place to be for any individual looking for quality, a unique shopping experience, customer service and the best prices. This is why Lulu gifts are great! Whether it is for your mother, your father, your relatives or your friends, Lulu gift cards will not disappoint them and will truly make them happy! If you would like to see more options on electronics or fashion & accessories check out our list in the categories.

name: Max
description:
Today Max is the leading and most trusted value fashion retailer in the Middle East and aims to have a network of over 500 stores across the MENA region and new markets by 2020.

Max serves the mid-market section of the population consisting of Arab Nationals, Asians and Western expats and employs over 8,000 people from multiple nationalities across its network.

Our stores typically measure between 10,000 sq. ft. to 30,000 sq. ft., with interiors designed to offer you a convenient and streamlined shopping experience. We strive to bring our customers value fashion and merchandise which is designed in-house and manufactured to stringent quality standards. Our offerings are regularly updated to ensure that they always delight customers with fresh new choices, making the store more vibrant. Max retails its own label of apparel for men, women and children along with footwear, accessories, cosmetics and household products.

name: McAfee Total Protection
description:
This Subscription is for upto 5 Devices for 1 Year.

McAfee Total Protection stands tall with its combination of Antivirus, Privacy and Identity tools and features. Defend yourself against the latest Virus, Malware, Ransomware and Spyware attacks, while keeping your identity and privacy close and personal.

With all the Windows PCs, Macs, tablets and smartphones that help power your family’s day-to-day, it’s hard enough to keep track of their devices, much less protect them. With a single McAfee Total Protection subscription, you can protect five devices without skipping a beat and most importantly, without slowing the family down.

name: Microsoft Xbox Live (USD)
description:
Available Denominations include :

$15 (SAR 59) | $25 (SAR 99) | $50 (SAR 199)

Get the gamer on your list a digital Xbox Live Gift Card to use online at the Microsoft Store, and games and entertainment on Xbox and Windows.

With an Xbox Gift Card, you give them the freedom to pick the gift they want. It can be used to buy the hottest new Xbox full game downloads, apps and more. This digital eGift code is valid for purchases at Microsoft Store online, on Windows and on Xbox.

They can also get the  latest games, map packs, movies, TV, music, apps and more, and on Xbox One, they could use it to buy and download blockbuster games the day they're released !

Great as a gift, allowance, or credit card alternative.

name: Kunooz Pharmacy
description: Kunooz offers a wide range of products covering every need, ranging from health, skincare, beauty, products designed specifically for moms & babies and much more!. You can shop for yourself and your family in one spot and get the best prices and offers from amongst the most popular brands. Ask for it and you’ll find it at Kunooz!

Get the gamer on your list a digital Xbox Live Gift Card to use online at the Microsoft Store, and games and entertainment on Xbox and Windows.

With an Xbox Gift Card, you give them the freedom to pick the gift they want. It can be used to buy the hottest new Xbox full game downloads, apps and more. This digital eGift code is valid for purchases at Microsoft Store online, on Windows and on Xbox.

They can also get the  latest games, map packs, movies, TV, music, apps and more, and on Xbox One, they could use it to buy and download blockbuster games the day they're released !

Great as a gift, allowance, or credit card alternative.

name: Sun&Sand Sports
description: Sun&Sands Sports (SSS) is the region’s largest and most popular multi-brand sports and lifestyle retailer.

name: Swarovski
description: Masters of crystal-cutting, delivering extraordinary everyday style to women around the world. Appreciate the naturally brilliant detail, and be admired for it.

name: Tamimi Markets
description:
Tamimi Markets is one of the fastest-growing supermarket chains in Saudi Arabia, and Saudi shoppers named Tamimi Markets a Top 100 Saudi Brand 5 times in the past 6 years. Our vision is to be the best supermarket in the kingdom, with a focus on customer service, quality, freshness, variety and competitive prices every day.

We also import foods, produce and household products from across the globe, including Asia, Australia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, China, Egypt, Ethiopia, France, Holland, Lebanon, Mexico, New Zealand, the Philippines, South Africa, Syria, United Kingdom and USA.

Our well-stocked departments provide special services such as custom cakes, sliced fresh bread, freshly grated cheese and fresh ground meats. Our ready-to-go convenience foods include brick oven bread and pizza, rotisserie chickens, Tamimi’s famous homemade hummus, salads and fresh appetizers. And we’re the first grocery store in Saudi Arabia to emphasize healthy choices with a special Healthy Living department featuring organic, natural, dairy-free, gluten-free and sugar-free foods.

name: Virgin Megastore
description: Virgin Megastore is a global leader in retail entertainment with over 8 stores across KSA. A one-stop shop for all your entertainment needs; Virgin Megastore offers a wide range of products, including CDs, DVDs, BOOKS, Electronics, Multimedia, Games,Accessories, merchandise computers and a whole lot more.

name: Whites
description: Whites is the Kingdom’s leading beauty and lifestyle retailer, that inspires one to look beautiful and feel confident by offering a diverse range of exclusive and internationally acclaimed make-up, skincare, haircare, personal care, lifestyle and wellness brands.

name: Circle Nail Bar
description: Are you stuck for gift ideas? Whether it is for your friend, sister, mother, or wife. Just imagine the look on her face when you give her the gift of a fine treatment at Circle Nail Bar.

name: Steam (US Account)
description: Download and play your favourite PC games from Steam using Steam Wallet cards, Steam Wallet Card provides you with cash to spend on the content you crave. Download and play your favorite games.

name: Foot Locker
description:
Sneakers are our culture.
A source of energy that sparks moments and influences sports and style.
At the center of it all, you’ll find Foot Locker And our iconic stripers. . .
Absorbing all the positivity generated by sneakers.
And pumping it back out into the world.
Engaged in communities. Boosting confidence. Showing up with a blend of passion, knowledge, and taste you can’t get anywhere else.
Holding it down while hyping you up.
Now is the time to put the world on notice and show everyone that Foot Locker is The Heart of Sneakers.

name: Apparel
description:
Apparel Group now introduces the perfect Gift for all Occasions, the Apparel Gift Card - To celebrate love, gratitude, friendship, and a hundred other sentiments that require more than just words !

This convenient card allows recipients to buy what they want, whenever they want, and is a great way to treat the people you love.

With so many brands to choose from, the Apparel Gift Card offers a wholesome shopping experience for its customers.

name: Starbucks
description: Starbucks stands out as the number 1 choice of Coffee in the region. Sourced for the season, and crafted with care.

name: VOX Cinemas KSA
description: VOX Cinemas is the Middle East's most innovative and exciting cinema and entertainment provider. Cinemagoers can watch the best of Hollywood, Bollywood and everything in between at our state of the art cinemas which have the best seats, best digital screens and best Dolby digital multi-channel surround sound systems.

name: Crocs
description: Crocs is a world leader in innovative casual footwear for men, women and children. Crocs offers a broad portfolio of all-season products, while remaining true to its core molded footwear heritage. All Crocs shoes feature Croslite material, a proprietary, revolutionary technology that gives each pair of shoes the soft, comfortable, lightweight and non-marking qualities that Crocs fans know and love.

name: Faces
description:
You liked us as Wojooh, you will love us as Faces! Faces is the leading beauty retailer in the region with 20 years of presence and expertise in the market. With 85 stores across 9 countries and an online presence, we are still growing with an international expansion in the near future. Being pioneers in beauty retail in the region has allowed us to become undeniable fragrance, makeup and skincare experts.

Our brand has grown and evolved through the years, but our core values remain to always be authentic, caring and inspiring to our clients.

We are a human value driven retailer who genuinely cares for its clients and their singular needs. We aim at satisfying them, whoever they are, and wherever they are; by offering them an amazing curated choice of exclusive products, one of the most generous loyalty programs in the region, as well as a wide array of bespoke and inclusive experiences and services, using innovative technologies. We seek to make their journey a deeply enjoyable one and create a real emotional connection in every beauty moment.

We come from a place that understands your beauty needs. Beauty is all about exchange of tips, inspiration, and expertise, and we’ve really evolved into a brand that has transcended past your traditional retailer. The spectrum of beauty in itself has become more complex being the most rapidly evolving retail sector, and we’ve embraced those changes and trends to stay ahead in the game.

More than ever, Beauty is about self-expression, embracing diversity and experimentation. We want to help reveal each person’s uniqueness, and we want to give you the tools and support to express your beauty.

FACES, Live your beauty.

name: Tanagra
description: This unique store, a place where your mind is inspired, your heart excited, and your soul amazed. Transform your home into a journey of self-expression.

name: The Chefz
description: The Chefz app is the largest platform for restaurant delivery and reservations, flowers and gifts, and catering.

name: Tommy Hilfiger
description: Tommy Hilfiger is one of the world’s leading designer lifestyle brands delivering superior styling, quality & value along with classic American cool style to consumers worldwide for men, women & kids.

name: Toys R US
description:
What place does every kid love and dream to have their own money to spend in? It’s none other than Toys “R” Us! Discover the greatest toys with Toys R Us, world’s greatest toy store. Buy a Gift Card that you can send to your kid, friend, and family or loved ones.

One of the most difficult tasks is to buy a present for a child, because we are not always up to date with what they may like. This would be a seamless option, as you would be giving them the opportunity to buy the gift of their choice! It couldn’t be more perfect!

Toys R Us brings out the kid in everyone with its fabulous and fun selection of toys, and children's merchandise! With a wide selection of toys to pick from various categories such as building blocks, dolls, cars, indoor and outdoor toys, art & craft toys, educational toys etc the gift recipient will have enough to select from.

name: Spotify Premium
description:
Available Subscription Options Include :

SAR 22 - Gets you 1 Month of Spotify Premium Service
SAR 64 - Gets you 3 Months of Spotify Premium Service
SAR 120 - Gets you 6 Months of Spotify Premium Service
SAR 199 - Gets you 12 Months of Spotify Premium Service (Only Pay for 10 Months and save SAR 40!)

Get a Spotify Premium prepaid card for 1, 3, 6 or 12 months.
Enjoy local and international ad-free music on Spotify Premium.
Download songs to save your data. Play music in the back-ground.

name: Jarir Bookstore
description:
Looking for a perfect gift but you don’t have time to shop or still undecided on what gift you want to give? Worry no more as Jarir Bookstore E-gift card is finally here!

Jarir Bookstore is the #1 retailer in GCC and offers a wide range and the latest selection of Smartphones, Tablets, Laptops, Video game consoles/games, Smart TVs, Electronics and computer accessories, Books, Office & School Supplies, Kids’ toys & learning and Arts & crafts products. We definitely have a perfect gift for all ages.

Jarir Bookstore has 59 showrooms and growing in Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait, and Abu Dhabi 

It’s long been seen as one of the best shopping destinations. We take pride in providing our customers with the best atmosphere, a wide range of selection and customer service!

name: Balabala
description: Balabala was established in 2002 and is one of the leading children's fashion brands in Asia. We offer stylish clothing, shoes, and accessories for children aged 0-14. Operating in 12 countries with over 4600 stores, we aim to meet children's needs and inspire them through dreams, exploration, enjoyment, and love, ensuring that all children worldwide have a happy childhood.

name: Al Shaya Watches
description: Al Shaya is the premier destination for luxury watches in Saudi Arabia, where one can find internationally acclaimed brands like Sevenfriday, D1 Milano, Frederique Constant, Alpina, Daniel Wellington, Guess, Victorinox and many more. The Al Shaya Watches eGift Card is a gift that you could be certain would be cherished for a long time, whether it's gifted for a special occasion, an important event or just to make someone's day memorable!

name: Ubuy
description:
Ubuy is not your usual e-commerce website! Ubuy provides its customers with access to an excellent variety of products spread across multiple categories such as Fashion & Jewellery, Electronics, Office Products and much more.

Based in Kuwait, Ubuy offer its services in more than 50 countries around the world through its convenient website, providing its shoppers with access to a whole range of product categories that satisfies their every want and need and is backed by Ubuy’s promise of quality and its 24/7 customer service. How to use :Use eGift Code online on the Ubuy Website.
